about_the_game:
Aimi is a short, atmospheric horror game initially created for the IGMC 2018 but which has since been expanded upon and improved. This game is heavily story-driven, with horror taking a backseat to a more in touch and emotional story and with gameplay being made up of puzzles in between longer cutscenes. An initial playthrough of Aimi could be completed in about 1 hour. However, there are multiple different endings that can extend gameplay. Additionally, Aimi was developed as a sort of therapy game by a 16-year-old kid (me!) so do keep that in mind.

While Aimi contains only a few optional jumpscares, there is a lot of cartoon blood and gore and extensive swearing. The game explores themes of mental illness and suicide in a thoughtful manner.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Almost every random crash, increase in lag, or other error can be fixed entirely with a simple game restart. If you encounter an error that isn't fixed after a restart, please message me in one of the appropriate forums.

content_descriptors.notes: While no content shown in this product is meant to glorify these actions, there are frequent depictions of violence and gore, along with suggested suicide.

This game is heavily story-driven, with horror taking a backseat to a more in touch and emotional story and with gameplay being made up of puzzles in between longer cutscenes. Additionally, Aimi was developed as a sort of therapy game by a 16-year-old kid (me!) so do keep that in mind.

While Aimi contains only a few optional jumpscares, there is a lot of cartoon blood and gore and extensive swearing. The game explores themes of mental illness and suicide in a thoughtful manner.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra (10.12) or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Aimi runs on my dads 10 year old Mac so you should be fine.

name: Aimi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gotta be honest here I'm not 100% how to fill all this out but Aimi should run on most modern computers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Memories swirl all around you...Or are these memories? Familiar faces and places you think you remember but somehow now seem so different. Why are you here? Where is here?
